resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.name: DEFORESTATION_PARAGUAY
resizeBy.label: Territorial Deforestation
resizeBy.description: Total deforestation per municipality for a given year (ha)

resizeBy.name: POTENTIAL_SOY_DEFORESTATION_V2
resizeBy.label: Maximum soy deforestation
resizeBy.description: Maximum potential soy-related deforestation (ha). Calculated as the maximum deforestation in the year prior to soy being harvested that could be attributable to soy expansion for that harvest.

recolorBy.name: ZD_COMMITMENT_BRAZIL_SOY
recolorBy.label: Zero Deforestation Commitment (Exporter)
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on whether different soy traders have zero deforestation commitments or not. Zero deforestation commitments are labelled as “company commitment”, or “Soy Moratorium”, depending on which kind of policy applies. Where a Soy Moratorium signatory also has a company commitment, soy traded from within the Amazon is simply labelled as “Soy Moratorium”.

recolorBy.name: SMALLHOLDERS
recolorBy.label: Smallholder dominance
recolorBy.description: Colour the supply chain flows according to density of smallholders, defined as the proportion of total property area in the hands of legally defined family farmers versus the total area of all properties. Based on 2006 census data.

recolorBy.name: WATER_SCARCITY
recolorBy.label: Water scarcity
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on level of criticality of water stress (1-7), calculated as the median water stress level per municipality, in terms of percentage of available blue water.

recolorBy.name: LR_DEFICIT_PERC_PRIVATE_LAND
recolorBy.label: Legal Reserve Deficit as a % of private land
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on area of Legal Reserves that must be restored or compensated off-farm to achieve compliance with the Brazilian Forest Code - as a percentage of total private land. Based on 2018 analysis.

recolorBy.name: BIOME
recolorBy.label: Biome
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows in accordance with the biome of the sourcing region.

recolorBy.name: FOREST_500
recolorBy.label: Forest 500 score
recolorBy.description: Colour supply chain flows based on the Forest 500 index, which ranks traders according to the strength of their sustainability commitments.

resizeBy.name: SOY_DEFORESTATION_1_YEAR
resizeBy.label: Soy deforestation risk (1 year)
resizeBy.description: Annual deforestation and habitat clearance (ha) risk associated with soy expansion (currently only available in the Amazon and Cerrado). This measure of deforestation risk is allocated to the actors along the supply chain in proportion to the volume of a soy that they export from a given jurisdiction relative to the total production of soy (by all actors) in the same jurisdiction. Deforestation risk for a given year of export is based on deforestation that occurs in the previous year (when the soy that is being exported was planted and harvested).

resizeBy.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_SOY_DEFORESTATION_1_YEAR
resizeBy.label: CO2 Emissions risk from soy deforestation (1 year)
resizeBy.description: CO2 emissions risk attributable to annual soy associated deforestation, including from above and below-ground biomass and litter. This measure of emissions risk is allocated to the actors along the supply chain in proportion to the volume of soy that they export from a given jurisdiction relative to the total production of soy (by all actors) in the same jurisdiction. Emissions risks associated with a supply chain for a given year of export is based on deforestation and associated emissions that occurs in the previous year.

resizeBy.name: DEFORESTATION_V2
resizeBy.label: Territorial deforestation
resizeBy.description: Total deforestation per municipality for a given year (ha). Calculated only for forested and wooded biomes - the Amazon, Cerrado and Atlantic Forest. Clearance of native vegetation in Brazil´s other biomes (Caatinga, Pantanal and Pampas) is not considered as deforestation in this indicator.

resizeBy.name: SOY_AREA_
resizeBy.label: Land use
resizeBy.description: Area of land being used to produce the traded commodity. Based on exported volumes and yield values per jurisdiction.

resizeBy.name: GHG_
resizeBy.label: Land based CO2 Emissions
resizeBy.description: CO2 emissions risk attributable to territorial deforestation, including from above and below-ground biomass and litter. This rate is allocated to the actors along the supply chain in proportion to the volume of soy that they export from a given jurisdiction relative to the total production of soy (by all actors) in the same jurisdiction.

resizeBy.name: CO2_EMISSIONS_SOY_DEFORESTATION_5_YEAR
resizeBy.label: CO2 Emissions risk from soy deforestation (5 years)
resizeBy.description: CO2 emissions risk attributable to soy associated deforestation in the previous five years, including from above and below-ground biomass and litter. This measure of emissions risk is allocated to the actors along the supply chain in proportion to the volume of soy that they export from a given jurisdiction relative to the total production of soy (by all actors) in the same jurisdiction. Emissions risks associated with a supply chain for a given year of export is based on deforestation and associated emissions that occurs in the previous five years.

resizeBy.name: SOY_DEFORESTATION_5_YEAR
resizeBy.label: Soy deforestation risk (5 years)
resizeBy.description: Total deforestation and habitat clearance risk (ha) in the previous 5 years that is associated with soy expansion (currently only available in the Amazon and Cerrado). This measure of deforestation risk is allocated to the actors along the supply chain in proportion to the volume of soy that they export from a given jurisdiction relative to the total production of soy (by all actors) in the same jurisdiction. Deforestation risk for a given year of export is based on deforestation that occurs in the previous five years, during which time the soy being exported was planted and harvested.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated. For example exports of soy cake and soy oil are converted to soybean equivalents in the areas of production, where farmers are just producing beans.

resizeBy.name: FOB
resizeBy.label: Financial flow
resizeBy.description: Value of the traded product in US dollars as it flows along the supply chain based on the value of the shipment as reported at the port of export (termed Freight on Board value, or FOB). Based on customs and trade data.

resizeBy.name: Volume
resizeBy.label: Trade volume
resizeBy.description: Amount of the traded commodity (tons). The total value is a composite of traded sub-products, which are converted to their original raw equivalents and then aggregated.
